Police and Customs discover 515kg of meth inside steel beams in one of NZ’s largest drug busts https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-and-customs-discover-515kg-of-meth-inside-steel-beams-in-one-of-nzs-largest-drug-busts/PTQJFZZWQRGWHIBF4PGMYZK6TA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-and-customs-discover-515kg-of-meth-inside-steel-beams-in-one-of-nzs-largest-drug-busts/PTQJFZZWQRGWHIBF4PGMYZK6TA/ Jared SavageTwo men from Australia arrested while 'deconstructing' the beams to get drugs inside. Tue, 08 Oct 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Police and Customs found 515kg of methamphetamine inside these steel beams imported from the United States in September 2024. Five men, aged between 31 and 51, were arrested and charged with drug offences following Operation Girder. Photo / NZ Police
